Articles.Content:
Hi all, fresh install of xubuntu and KSP, game launches fine but for the life of me the keyboard just is not working at all? Anyone seen this? What am I missing?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-30T05:20:10Z" title="05/30/2015 05:20  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 30, 2015</time> by Claw**

Solved: Was very odd, Im using a razor keyboard, I plug in a microsoft keyboard at the same time, it must install its own driver on detection, all of a sudden both keyboards start working. Its like it got a jumpstart ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) eitherway im happy!
